data.expected_result: Chat stays at the scrolled position it was in prior
data.short_description: Toggling certain Text & Image settings (When posted as links, When posted directly to Discord, Show website preview info) causes chat to lose your current scrolled position
data.steps_to_repro: - Be scrolled up in chat from the bottom - Go into User Settings > Text & Images - Toggle Show website preview info off/on (doesn't matter what it was originally set to) - Exit out of User Settings and observe
